ceterms:assertedBy.ceterms:description:
The Computing Technology Industry Association (CompTIA) is the leading provider of vendor-neutral IT certifications in the world.

With more than 2,000,000 IT certifications issued worldwide, CompTIA is dedicated to helping IT professionals lead the charge in our digitally connected world.

For more than 20 years, CompTIA has developed training and certification exams for computing support, networking, security, open-source (Linux) development, cloud and mobility. Our regular review and updates of exams ensure that CompTIA certifications continue to address the needs of today’s technology challenges.

CompTIA is a non-profit trade association serving as the voice of the information technology industry. Through professional certifications, educational programs, research, networking events, philanthropy and public policy advocacy, CompTIA is dedicated to helping advance the IT industry.
ceterms:assertedBy.ceterms:name: TESTING_CompTIA

ceterms:description: Linux has grown into an industry-leading software and service delivery platform that is used for everything from super computers and Web servers to virtualized systems and your Android phone. This growth creates a high demand for qualified Linux professionals. With CompTIA’s Linux+ Powered by LPI certification, you’ll acquire the fundamental skills and knowledge you need to successfully configure, manage and troubleshoot Linux systems.
ceterms:name: TESTING_CompTIA Linux+

ceterms:renewal.ceterms:description: The CompTIA Linux+ certification is considered good for life and does not need to be renewed.
ceterms:renewal.ceterms:name: CompTIA Linux+

ceterms:requires.ceterms:description: CompTIA Linux+ covers common tasks in major distributions of Linux, including the Linux command line, basic maintenance, installing and configuring workstations, and networking. Linux+ is comprised of two exams – LX0-103 and LX0-104. Candidates must pass LX0-103 before taking LX0-104.
ceterms:requires.ceterms:experience: Recommended experience is CompTIA A+, CompTIA Network+ and 12 months of Linux admin experience.
ceterms:requires.ceterms:name: CompTIA Linux+
